alert.note: Alert for Boone County Except Southwest; Boone County Higher Elevations; Johnson County Higher Elevations; Newton County Higher Elevations; Newton County Lower Elevations; Pope County Higher Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 08 at 1:59PM CST until January 09 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 3 PM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze, with locally higher amounts possible. Winds gusting as high as 40.0 mph. * WHERE...Portions of north-central to northwest Arkansas. * WHEN...From 6 AM to 3 PM CST Tuesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Difficult travel conditions and power outages are possible. Gusty wind conditions may exacerbate these hazards.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Be sure to check road conditions before traveling in these areas. Visit the Arkansas Department of Transportation`s website Idrivearkansas.com for the latest road and traffic conditions.
